text: This review is based solely on the wings. Fried and infused with Indian spices; a must try

East Coast Transplant here who approves this message! LOL

Here you will find East Coast Donairs with the sweet sauce, (yes, the real sweet sauce!) 

Ah, life is good!

Why is it so damn hard to find the best creation, why do you have to be so far from me! :(

I always have to make a stop, when I am close by, and those garlic fingers......
Don't even get me started, just go, go now....

You can thank me later! ;)
Excellent East Coast Style Donairs with the sweet sauce, friendly staff and reasonable prices. What's not to love?
